titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Kennedy. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.
Committee on Rules. Ordered favorably reported an original resolution (S.Res. 381) in lieu of this measure.

bill.summary: 2/2/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources, from March 1, 1988, through February 28, 1989, to: (1) make expenditures from the contingent fund; (2) employ personnel; (3) utilize, on a reimbursable basis, the services of department or agency personnel; (4) procure consultant services; and (5) provide for training its professional staff.
